content: the crochet swancho cal is hosted by marly bird and sponsored by yarnspirations this is a 4 week crochet along to make a very on trend sweater/poncho the fit is very customizable and the neckline comes with two options all the details about the pattern and the crochet-along can be found at the link provided to fit size s/m l/xl 2x/3x 4x/5x the sweater is oversized with 5-10 of ease sweater shown is 2x/3x **note about size ** when picking out your size make sure you check the finished bust the sweater is designed to be oversized just to keep in mind if you are between 2 sizes you can certainly make it one size smaller to have a tighter fit finished bust measurement 44 51 59 66 112 129 5 150 167 5 cm bust circumference
